title: Real Estate Investing As “Passive Income” Is a Myth! (Hour 2)
description:
Take our Audience Survey & Enter to Win a $500 Visa Gift Card: Click here to take the survey

Dave Ramsey & Kristina Ellis discuss:

The myth of "passive income" from no-money-down real estate investing,

The peace that life insurance can bring,

Applying for scholarships.
